titles.title: To extend the sales period for the Christopher Columbus Quincentenary coin.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E1512)
Referred to the House Committee on Banking, Finance + Urban Affrs.

committee.name: House Committee on Banking, Finance + Urban Affrs

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Consumer Credit and Insurance.

committee.name: House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs
House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs

bill.summary: 6/15/1993--Introduced. Amends the Christopher Columbus Quincentenary Coin Act to extend the sales period for the Christopher Columbus Quincentenary coin from June 1993 to June 1994.
